alert.note: Alert for Montgomery; Polk (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 05 at 6:16PM CDT until September 05 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: The National Weather Service in Little Rock has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Polk County in western Arkansas... West central Montgomery County in western Arkansas... * Until 700 PM CDT. * At 616 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Shady, or 9 miles southeast of Mena, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Shady... Caney Creek Wilderness... Opal... Mena Intermountain Airport... Big Fork... Board Camp... Nunley... Cherry Hill in Polk County... Ink... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
